title: "Apple’s Computer Vision Tool for Developers Now Tracks Dogs & Cats"
excerpt: "Would reality really be complete without our beloved four-legged friends? Certainly not. Luckily the latest update to Apple’s ‘Vision’ framework—which gives developers a bunch of useful computer vision tools for iOS and iPad apps—includes the ability to identify and track the skeletal position of dogs and cats."
